content.body: Chrome attempts to load the source map via the inspected page itself at first. So if the page fails to `fetch` the source map, so will Chrome DevTools
content.formatted_body: Chrome attempts to load the source map via the inspected page itself at first. So if the page fails to fetch the source map, so will Chrome DevTools

content.body: interesting. the error isn't of any use really ("unexpected error" or some such thing). but im guessing its a cross-origin thing then
in this case im also using devtools for node, so there is no 'page'. not sure what the rules are then, i.e. what is the origin etc
